text:
="preserve">Pamela Kosh (13 March 1930 – 21 October 2020) was an actress who appeared in two episodes of Star Trek: The Next Generation.
Kosh was featured as a guest performer on numerous American television programs. Her television credits include Dr. Quinn: Medicine Woman, Northern Exposure, Ned and Stacey, Family Matters, Providence, Alias and The King of Queens. However, her most famous role on the small screen was as Miss Simpson in the teen sitcom, Saved By the Bell.
She passed away on October 21, 2020.
